flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
You will need 2 Feet of 4 Inch PVC Pipe.

3 Feet of 2 Inch PVC Pipe.

90 Degree angle elbow (1 Inch)

A screw on fitting for the 1 Inch elbow

A 4 Inch cap dont glue it

And 4 bolts 4 nuts and 4 rubber washers

Clear cleaner and PVC sement
guide.introduction_rendered:
You will need 2 Feet of 4 Inch PVC Pipe.

3 Feet of 2 Inch PVC Pipe.

90 Degree angle elbow (1 Inch)

A screw on fitting for the 1 Inch elbow

A 4 Inch cap dont glue it

And 4 bolts 4 nuts and 4 rubber washers

Clear cleaner and PVC sement
guide.summary: I thought this would be a good project for myself so I looked for scraps around the house.
guide.title: Potato Gun
